attributes.action: Make the BBC stop using license fee money to make Mrs Brown's Boys.
attributes.additional_details:
I wish for the Government to stop public spending going towards making Mrs Brown's Boys. 
Another 6 years of this is too much for a country already suffering.
attributes.background: 2020 has been a terrible year for us all and it has come to light that BBC wish to keep making and airing Mrs Brown's Boys until 2026. This cannot happen. We've simply suffered enough. Using license fee money to make this awful show should be a crime.

rejection.details: This is an operational decision for the BBC, not the UK Government or Parliament.
